ingredients.ingredient: 12 ounces large shrimp, peeled and deveined

cookingTips: Toss shrimp gently with oil and seasonings to ensure even coating
Smoke at 225°F for 15-20 minutes until shrimp are pink and just cooked through
Use a smoking rack or mesh tray to prevent small shrimp from falling through grates
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How can you prevent shrimp from overcooking and becoming rubbery during the smoking process?
